result.title: Codecracker 2015 Round 2
result.content:
Round 2 of CODECRACKER hosted by NIT Durgapur shall start at 21:30 IST today!! Don't worry if you missed out on all the fun yesterday, you can still win prizes upto 25,000 INR. The results shall be decided by the cumulative performance in both the rounds for deciding the prizes.

The questions of Round 2 are going to be more challenging and interesting and so we've decided to increase the time to 3 hours for the competition.

Log on to http://codecracker.in

and follow https://www.facebook.com/events/867191919969063/ for updates :)

Round2: Timings: 21:30 IST Duration: 3 hours
